name: ILP-2_In Space
description:
You just got stuck in space inside your ship without any form of self-defense. You have no weapons and you must survive for one minute before you are taken out by alien spaceships. 

INSTRUCTIONS:

- Use the mouse cursor to move the spaceship

- Don't let the enemy spaceships make contact with you

- Survive for 60 seconds 

- Enemies spawn at random locations
